title: What happened in the year 1620 in America? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: The Mayflower landed in Virginia, the other Ship turned back as did the Mayflower, to get people from other Ship on Board. They all Landed cut down a Tree and declared this Land to and for GOD. Made a Cross at that time. Stuck it in the ground. All refused to leave, no matter the cost! They all died refusing to leave, no matter What!, As GOD told them to come here. They made the Mayflower Compact out of the KJV Bible, which was and is our Constitution today. The founders use it to make ours. that we still have and use. Only one women lived to pass it on. A lot were teachers and Preachers. Landed 1620–1640 and this land is GODs like Israel land was given by GOD to them. The only two in History land Given to them by The true GOD! Who comes in three way’s to Direct us to him, and then Heaven. WOW how far we fell!!! Has to make him sick,

A group of English colonists known as the Pilgrims landed at what is Provincetown, MA on November 9, 1620. There was a Colony at Jamestown, VA. In 1619 about 20 Africans arrived in Jamestown and were put to work as indentured servants. Several million Native Americans lived throughout was America. Spanish colonies extended from the southern US, Mexico, the Caribbean, Central America and South America before 1620. French colonial settlements were founded in Quebec and Nova Scotia, Canada by 1620. Dutch settlers built a Fort near Albany, NY in 1617. The Portuguese were colonizing South America.
